text_block_list.text: It is now the classic year. As for Stay Gold...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, have you tried the steak over there? The one they grill right in front of you. It was delicious.
I was here with him at the Mejiro family's New Year's party, invited by Mejiro McQueen.
choice_data_list: You're the same as always, no matter where you are...
You're the same as always, no matter where you are...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Unfortunately, I only know how to be 'the same as always.'
Stego-sama~.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Happy New Year. I look forward to working with you this year as well~.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Oh, Bright and Dober. Happy New Year.
The Umamusume who appeared with Mejiro Bright was Mejiro Dober. Like Mejiro Bright, she's a contemporary of Stay Gold, but...
She's an Umamusume aiming to run in the 'Oka Sho,' 'Yushun Himba,' and 'Shuka Sho,' following the Tiara route. As such, there are currently few opportunities to compete against her in races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I heard you're training with McQueen. That it's going really well.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hahaha. Actually, I just keep getting beaten to a pulp by him every time, but...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Thanks to that, the view's getting better. Well, in that sense, it's going smoothly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I've also started my final adjustments for spring~.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to it. Competing against you, Stego-sama, in the Classic races.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Haha, that's an honor.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely make it there. ...To the 'Satsuki Sho.'
After chatting briefly with Mejiro Bright and the others, while enjoying the food with Stay Gold...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm feeling pretty full, so I think it's about time to head out~.
choice_data_list: Huh, but we haven't seen McQueen yet.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: We'll probably meet during training anyway. I can thank him for today then...
...I thought it might be something like that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Honestly, if I don't go to you, you'd really just leave...

text_block_list.name: A Refined Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Happy New Year, Stay Gold-sama. I look forward to working with you this year as well.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Happy New Year. Thanks for all your help last year.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Also, the food was delicious, McQueen. Especially the meat.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm glad you enjoyed it, but wouldn't you like to stay a little longer?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Staying in one place just isn't in my nature. I was thinking of going out to play or something—

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...That's right. You guys should come too, McQueen. It's a good opportunity. Let's have fun together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Again, that's quite sudden—

text_block_list.name: A Refined Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...Um, McQueen-sama. If it's alright, I'd like to accompany Stay Gold-sama.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Oh, nice. That makes it 3 against 1.
choice_data_list: (When did I get included in the count...?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Understood. Actually, I was free after this, so I'll join you. However—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please escort us properly. After all, you're the one who suggested it.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Got it. Alright, Trainer, I'll leave the destination to you.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: It'll probably be more fun than if I decide. I'm counting on you.
It was a sudden, unreasonable request, but as a companion on her journey, I want to meet her expectations. For now, what comes to mind is—
choice_data_list: Go to an arcade or something...?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Haha, yeah, just wandering around aimlessly works too. Alright, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wh-where are you planning to go?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: If we decide that, it's not a walk anymore, right? Whatever, just whatever.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Where in the world is this place!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
So, where could it be?
Well, it's a nice view, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Elegant Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...A beautiful sunset...——

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Yeah.
It looks like the horizon is on fire.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Haa... It's fine.
This is just how you are...

...After admiring the beautiful sunset like this,
we ended up checking our current location and being surprised——

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Tea, huh?... Good opportunity.
There's a shop I've been wanting to check out.

text_block_list.name: Elegant Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
A shop that Stay Gold-sama is interested in...
I'm very curious!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ................I have a bad feeling about this.

text_block_list.name: Zombie Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text:
Ava va va!! (We'll take your order!)
Va va vaa! (Please wait a moment!)

text_block_list.name: Zombie Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: Vaa~~~!!! (Thank you very much!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Eek...! W-what is this!?
This creepy shop!!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Ha ha ha! Their movements are amazing!
And I have no idea what they're saying!!

text_block_list.name: Elegant Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Looking closely, the interior is very elaborate too,
it's wonderful...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh come on, why are all of you
enjoying this normally!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, calm down.
The sweets are supposed to be delicious,
so look forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Really...!?
If it's a lie, I won't forgive you...!

After that, we all enjoyed
the sweets that looked creepy but tasted exquisite——

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
An arcade, huh.
Well, maybe that's good once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Elegant Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
A game center, right?
I've never been, so I'm curious...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Huh...
Then, let's go enjoy the unknown. Young lady.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Hup, hup, hup.

text_block_list.name: Elegant Chestnut Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Stay Gold-sama, you're amazing...!
Every shot is hitting perfectly...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
P-please don't come any closer!
Ahh, I'm out of ammo...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Got it, leave it to me. --Right here.
choice_data_list: Whoa, you hit the weak spot in one shot...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, thank you...
You saved me.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Phew. Well, I'm taking a break now,
so McQueen, do your best on your own for a while.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
W-wait, at this moment!?
At least wait until it's over--

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I'll help if you ask me to.
So, what'll it be?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you planned this from the start...!
Ahh! There are too many enemies!!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hang in there~, McQuee~n.

And so, everyone had a lively time
playing at the arcade--
